rules_text:
Vigilance, trample
Spells and abilities you control that target Certhin Champion costs {3} less to cast or activate.
[i]Heroic[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell that targets Certhin Champion, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
flavor_text: [i]Being a champion isn't easy, but it's made easier when you are a master of arms.[/i]
